meaning: grow late, night watch, sit up late, of course, renew, renovate, again, more and more, further

onyomiExamples.meaning: the five night watches, fifth watch of the night (approx. 3am to 5am)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: furthermore, again, after all, more and more, moreover, even more
intentionally, deliberately, designedly, on purpose, especially, particularly
(not) at all, (not) in the least, (none) whatsoever
furthermore, again, after all, more and more, moreover, even more

kunyomiExamples.reading: さらにこまったことに

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to get late, to advance, to wear on
